data.name: 索罗灵魂之戒
data.detailed_description:
Game introduction


This is the continent of Stein. Full of fantasy colors, due to the energy storm. Space barrier rupture

A lot of people (dogs) have arrived on this continent...

My name is solo. I'm a magician. My legends are everywhere

Because ~ ~ ~ ~ when I stood at the top of Stein, I was almost a God.

But my favorite Lilith betrayed me in order to become a God. The body was destroyed. The soul is hidden in the ring.

After that, he lingered. In order to become stronger, I had to use forbidden art. Became shrem. Devour the demon

Attached to a cute sister

The traditional round based RPG game has the plot of sand sculpture, funny ratio, decryption and ignorant force reversal. Attachment, change. The happy fantasy of leather objects Make you happy and have all kinds of harem.

Strange skills and monsters with question marks make you experience different RPG

There is also an extremely high mortality rate with an ignorant face. Let you challenge different fantasy adventures.

Low blood pressure and exercise mentality are recommended. Powerful souls play with humans. Weak humans, please don't play.

Game elements


Round RPG elements. Attribute restraint. Spell fusion.

Funny, hot stem game story.

Strange equipment system.

Gain different abilities through attachment.

Meet more beautiful girls.

Exquisite game map.

Long game time.

data.short_description: Very decompressed game. Have all kinds of benefits and dream skills. Let you enjoy different happiness RPG. Many networks are hot. Keep up with current events while making you happy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: IntelCore i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: IntelCore i7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
